This item was featured on CodeCanyon🚀

Building An Innovative NFT Marketplace For Unique Digital Assets

Create a Full-Functional NFT Marketplace, customize the storefront, and list unlimited NFTs. 

We get you ready within hours, not days.

Buy now
Read documentation

ERC-721

A widely popular NFT standard, you can create and import these NFTs into multiple NFT marketplaces.

Built in function →

ERC-1155

Create ERC-1155 multi-token standard NFTs and collections on EVM based blockchains from Smart NFT plugin.

Premium addons →

BEP/ERC-20

Create, Deploy, Import custom BEP/ERC-20 token standards and use to mint, buy and sell NFTs and collections.

Premium addons →
Get started in a few minutes

Get your NFT store up and running within a few clicks

It’s easier than ever. Set up a full-function website and have all your NFTs ready in just a few steps.

All EVM compatible 700+ chains supported
Create NFT
Create marketplace

Connect wallet

Install the crypto wallet browser extension and create an account.

Create Your NFT

Upload your NFT assets, set price, properties and hit create button.

Start selling

Earn from NFT sales, royalties, split payments, auction and re-sales.

Professionally designed for you

Explore our massive library of ready-made websites. Use the filters on the left to sort your results by light and dark theme, page builder compatibility, and website type.

Core Features

Simple for beginners, powerful for experts

We provide NFT marketplace services that enable users to establish a feature-rich NFT marketplace on several blockchain networks like as Ethereum, BNB, Polygon, Avalanche, Tezos, and others.
  • Multiple wallet integrations
  • Custom chain
  • ERC 721, ERC 1155 & ERC/BEP-20 token standard
  • Auction & Instant buying
  • Marketplace contract with inbuilt platform fee
  • Multiple cryptocurrency integrations
  • Royalty in primary and secondary sales
  • Split payment in primary and secondary sales
  • Unlock content
  • Create and mint own NFT collections
  • Decentralised file storage
  • Lazy Minting
  • MultiChain Support
  • Supports Multiple property types
  • Earn from platform/listing fees
  • Extensive profile
  • Service fee
  • Instant filters
  • Custom colors
  • Pageload animations

Get the Plugin

Why Choose a Dedicated NFT marketplace for Your Business?

We provide NFT marketplace services that enable users to establish a feature-rich NFT marketplace on several blockchain networks like as Ethereum, BNB, Polygon, Avalanche, Tezos, and others.

High-performing, secured Plugin

Unlike many plugins that come and go, the framework stood the test of time. Over the months, it grew to become one of the fastest and most secure plugins in the market.

Blockchain reliability

Universal, reliable and versatile infrastructure will suit any type of EVM-based smart contracts and it will benefit with 99.99% uptime.

Secure integrations

As you grow, you may want to expand your store with new functionalities. Thanks to Solidity flexibility, it’s easy to add new integrations and customize the store even once it's already developed.

Simple control panel

Controls and maintain layouts and numbers on all nft, collections, categories pages from admin dashboard.

Stable codebase

Smart NFT is a stable provides a stable code from v2.1 and with upgradable smart contracts to get the best experience without losing any nfts created past.

Constant data consistency

With the lowest possible delay, our blockchain saves and transfers 100% of transactions. We ensure that each customer will get 100% blockchain data consistency in less than a second.

Platform

Quick, Secured, and Transparent

Smart NFT will automatically deploy your secured smart contract and launch your very own minting website, allowing you to start selling from your NFTs immediately.

Launching on Smart NFT is easy: Just upload your artwork, choose your desired network, set your price and quantity, and click launch.

Create marketplace
Any Contract Any Chain

Deploy on any EVM compatible chain

Its simple, easy, secured to deploy smart contracts on any EVM compatible chains you want. The Marketplace contract will manage market functionality whereas ERC-721, ERC-1155 contracts will manage minting of NFTs.

  • 700+ support of all EVM Chains with the fastest RPC
  • Add any EMV chains except the built-in chains.
  • Manage deployed smart contracts.
Decentralised storage

Upload artwork and metadata to IPFS.

SmartNFT uses Infura IPFS to store NFT assets and metadata.Using this metadata in a standard NFT minting structure makes the NFTs importable in any NFT platforms. Besides, it makes it secured and transparent to blockchains.

Create NFT
Smart NFT for Businesses

Everything you need, all in one place

Looking to utilize NFTs? Great!

You’ll need a platform to create them, a marketplace to list them, and a wallet to help users trade and manage them.

Previously, you couldn’t do this all with a single line of products—but now you can.

Smdart NFT provides the end-to-end solution needed to launch NFT projects that help you generate new revenue streams and accelerate your company’s growth.

Get the Package

What people say

A plugin that I have been waiting for a long time. Simple to use and with very few bugs, but nothing too serious. I think the developers did an excellent job. Can't wait for the next update!

Keep up the good work!

Thank you TOPHIVE team for this plugin!
